verbose_text: It has also been demonstrated that CRP promotes the differentiation of human monocytes toward a proinflammatory phenotype and induces macrophage colony stimulating factor release via upregulation of NF-kappaB, resulting in increased macrophage recruitment and proliferation.
evidence: CRP promotes the differentiation of human monocytes toward a proinflammatory phenotype               and induces macrophage colony-stimulating factor
